```{r}
try <- ggplot(cnv, aes(x= cnv$value)) + 
  geom_histogram(color = 1, fill = "white",
                 bins = 100) 

cnv <- cnv %>% 
  mutate(seg_len = end - start)

try2 <- ggplot(cnv, aes(x= seg_len)) + 
  geom_histogram(color = 1, fill = "white",
                 bins = 20) +
  xlim(0,100000)
try
try2
```
